mapper.select: select t1.id userId, t1.username, t1.is_enable, t1.password, t3.auth_key role, t5.auth_key perm from tb_sys_user t1 left join tb_sys_user_role t2 on t1.id = t2.user_id left join tb_sys_role t3 on t3.id = t2.role_id left join tb_sys_role_menu t4 on t4.role_id = t3.id left join tb_sys_menu t5 on t5.id = t4.menu_id where t1.id = #{userId}

select t1.id userId, t1.username, t1.is_enable, t1.password, t3.auth_key role, t5.auth_key perm from tb_sys_user t1 left join tb_sys_user_role t2 on t1.id = t2.user_id left join tb_sys_role t3 on t3.id = t2.role_id left join tb_sys_role_menu t4 on t4.role_id = t3.id left join tb_sys_menu t5 on t5.id = t4.menu_id where t1.username = #{username}
